mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_pc_change_info ( pc_cpu, pc_memory, pc_macaddress, pc_ip, pc_hostname, pc_cpu_id, pc_uuid, org_seq, pc_disk, pc_disk_id, pc_user, insert_dt ) VALUES ( #{pc_cpu}, #{pc_memory}, #{pc_macaddress}, #{pc_ip}, #{pc_hostname}, #{pc_cpu_id}, #{pc_uuid}, #{org_seq}, #{pc_disk}, #{pc_disk_id}, #{pc_user}, NOW() )
